summary:
Read from and write to files. Open, read, write, and close files.  Use context managers (with statement) and handle different file formats. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.

This topic provides essential knowledge for understanding python at the Junior level. Through comprehensive study, students will develop a deep understanding of the concepts, principles, and applications related to File Handling. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in real-world contexts.
